title: Audiosurfboard (AudioSurf OFFLINE PATCH)
description:
Someone asked for this separate from the game, so here it is!

This is a program called "Audiosurfboard", which allows you to play the game "Audiosurf" (not included in this torrent) ALL DAY. Usually the game is only available on beta weekends, but not anymore. Run this program before running Audiosurf. If Audiosurf asks to update, REFUSE or you will mess up your Audiosurf copy. When asked to log in, punch in anything, your username will become Mothball and it will allow you to play.

DO NOT run this program while running Skype. They conflict, and you get some kind of port 80 error. Just shut off Skype, then run Audiosurfboard, and it&#039;ll work fine.
